mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (p_id, m_id, p_title, p_content, p_views, p_credate, p_moddate) VALUES (SEQUENCE_POST.nextval, #{m_id}, #{p_title}, #{p_content}, 0, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT post.* , member.m_image , member.m_nname FROM post FULL OUTER JOIN member ON post.m_id = member.m_id WHERE post.p_id = #{p_id}
mapper.update: update post set p_title = #{p_title}, p_content = #{p_content}, p_moddate = sysdate where p_id = #{p_id}
update post set p_views = p_views + 1 where num = #{value}
